reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is always well-prepared, provides comprehensive lectures, and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Professor Gray's explanations are clear, and he often stays after class to address students' questions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen's lectures are rich in content, but they can be dense and fast-paced at times.

reviews.subject: Data Science
reviews.review: His real-world examples make complex data modeling topics easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: She has interesting insights, but her lecture structure can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: His lab sessions are detailed and hands-on, which helps reinforce lecture content.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: She inspires deep discussions and encourages students to view problems from multiple angles.

reviews.subject: Engineering Design
reviews.review: Great knowledge and practical experience, but not always easy to approach during office hours.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Her passion for the subject is contagious. She uses visuals that make even complex topics digestible.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: He provides thorough explanations, but the pace is brisk. Stay engaged to keep up.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Her lectures cover the basics well, but real-life examples could be more frequent.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: He connects textbook theory with case studies, making the material feel immediately relevant.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her slides are informative, but the class can feel repetitive. Extra engagement outside lectures might help.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: His enthusiasm for rocks and minerals is infectious, and field trips are well organized.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: She brings in her industry experience, which makes class discussions engaging and practical.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Weiss encourages group discussions but the grading criteria can be a bit vague.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: She fosters debates and open dialogues, creating a dynamic learning atmosphere.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures often run over time, and he rarely addresses student questions thoroughly.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Her comparative approach makes analyzing different languages fascinating, though the readings are extensive.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: She breaks down complex concepts into simple steps and provides plenty of practice exercises.
